definitions.text: either of two offspring born at the same time from the same pregnancy
(astrology) a person who is born while the sun is in Gemini
a waterfall in the Snake River in southern Idaho

examples: The polished surface twinned his face and chest in reverse

definitions.text: bring two objects, ideas, or people together
examples: This fact is coupled to the other one
Matchmaker, can you match my daughter with a nice young man?
The student was paired with a partner for collaboration on the project
